column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////It was my first time at Bosscat and I have to tell you it was great!! The service from Terry and Jose (occasionally Theresa) was awesome. They told me the house favorites
column2: the story of Bosscats and of course the bottomless mimosa deal (what really matters). Would recommend if you're visiting Houston and want some good food and vibes!! Â FYI there's no room for picky eaters here
column3: the chef knows what he's doing so you have to trust the menu!!
